name: Koala Sling
description:
In a cute yet thrilling adventure playing koala sling. By hanging down to the top, but obstacles are always blocking the way up to make the koala sling fall and go down.
Feature: 1. Various menus for the selection buttons in the game. 2. Guides are provided to make it easier to play. 3. With easy steps to run just by tapping and sliding on the screen.
